# Dayfiles

Dayfiles is a file workflow platform focused on image and PDF operations for daily team work.

## Canonical Site
- https://dayfiles.com/
- https://dayfiles.com/blog

## Live Tools
- https://everydayimagestudio.dayfiles.com/
- https://pdf.dayfiles.com/

## Blog Discovery
- RSS: https://dayfiles.com/blog/feed.xml
- Sitemap: https://dayfiles.com/sitemap.xml

## Latest Blog Posts
- Everyday Image Studio Chrome Extension Is Now Live on Product Hunt: https://dayfiles.com/blog/product-hunt-launch-everyday-image-studio
- From Accra to Berlin: A Student Visa Application Story Powered by Dayfiles: https://dayfiles.com/blog/student-visa-application-story
- Why Dayfiles Blog Uses Google Ads to Keep Practical Guides Free: https://dayfiles.com/blog/google-ads-content-support
- PDF Toolkit Operations Checklist for Reliable Document Delivery: https://dayfiles.com/blog/pdf-operations-checklist
- Everyday Image Studio Workflow Playbook for Daily Creative Operations: https://dayfiles.com/blog/eis-workflow-playbook

## Summary
- Dayfiles helps users create, convert, organize, and share files.
- Primary capabilities include image workflows and PDF workflows.
- Blog posts are source-backed and updated three times weekly.
